name: Burger
description: A classic beef patty grilled to order and nestled in a toasted bun with crisp lettuce, ripe tomato, and your choice of condiments.

name: Cake
description: A moist, multi‑layered dessert cake slathered in creamy frosting, perfect for celebrating any occasion.

name: Chicken
description: Succulent rotisserie chicken, slow‑roasted over a wood fire until the skin is crisp and golden, with tender, juicy meat infused with aromatic herbs.

name: Lasagna
description: Hearty layers of pasta, rich meat (or vegetable) sauce, and melted cheese, baked until bubbly and golden.

name: Pie
description: A flaky pastry shell filled with sweet seasonal fruit (or savory ingredients), served warm or chilled with a crisp crust.

name: Pizza
description: Hand‑tossed dough topped with tangy tomato sauce, melted mozzarella, and your favorite toppings, baked to a perfect crisp.

name: Ramen
description: A steaming bowl of Japanese noodles in a savory broth, garnished with scallions, soft‑boiled egg, and tender slices of pork or tofu.

name: Salmon
description: A succulent salmon fillet, seasoned and pan‑seared or oven‑baked, served with a squeeze of lemon and fresh herbs.

name: Steak
description: A juicy cut of steak, seared to your preferred doneness and seasoned simply with salt, pepper, and a hint of garlic.

name: Sushi
description: An assortment of vinegared rice rolls or nigiri topped with fresh fish and vegetables, accompanied by soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
